string-array.name: GroupAlertsReset
string-array.item: This operation will set all the tasks that belong to this group to unfinished state. Do you really want to continue?

string-array.name: GroupAlertsFinishAll
string-array.item: This operation will set all the tasks that belong to this group to finished state. Do you really want to continue?

string-array.name: GroupAlertsDelete
string-array.item: This operation will delete all the tasks that belong to this group. Do you really want to continue?
